scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
